author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bce, depositi o/n in calo a 677,6 mld euro, prestiti a zero Bond
text: FRANKFURT, Jan 26 (Reuters) - The European Central Bank reported the following daily data on liquidity provision, in millions of euros. TODAY PREV Use of overnight loan facility 0 45 Use of overnight deposit facility 677,613 695,363 For additional details click here For details of previous ECB overnight lending operations, see: here For data on ECB market operations please click For Reuters calculation of money market liquidity level please click .
